name: AdvancedNonSmallCellLungCancer
title: Advanced Non Small Cell Lung Cancer
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts which may be used to codify a diagnosis of Non Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC).),(Data Element Scope: This value set would use the Diagnosis QDM category.),(Inclusion Criteria: SNOMEDCT codes related to Non Small Cell Lung Cancer.),(Exclusion Criteria: Those codes not identified in the inclusion criteria.)

concept.display: Metastasis from malignant tumor of lung (disorder)
Non-small cell carcinoma of lung, TNM stage 3 (disorder)
Non-small cell carcinoma of lung, TNM stage 4 (disorder)
Non-small cell lung cancer, positive for epidermal growth factor receptor expression (disorder)
Non-small cell lung cancer, negative for epidermal growth factor receptor expression (disorder)
Non-small cell lung cancer with mutation in epidermal growth factor receptor (disorder)
Non-small cell lung cancer without mutation in epidermal growth factor receptor (disorder)
Reactive oxygen species 1 positive non-small cell lung cancer (disorder)
